documents.document: .@jacklenox Follow all the news from the Copeland By-Election from the Green Candidate via https://t.co/kkycWdxmc3

Early start for train to Perth. Wet in Edinburgh - snow in Perth! https://t.co/4EUrLiizwL
@johnboy197832 also any issues 07595303095
@johnboy197832 here's a map it's just up from Waverley station - see you at 4!!! https://t.co/HUa7NrCTUN
@johnboy197832 hmm somewhere easy for you to find! How about by Waverley station by the entrance to Waverley mall?
@johnboy197832 Yeah could do - shall we meet in town somewhere?
Burns supper shaping up nicely ;-) @edinburghgreens https://t.co/Ni2NBqdM3T
@johnboy197832 if you mean old Waverley hotel its meant to be lovely. ;-)
@johnboy197832 Ok be lovely to if possible. But not worry as your time is limited and Im in Perth on the Saturday - no kids on this weekend?
@johnboy197832 I might be able to do the Friday night as I’m in Perth all day Saturday for a Conference! Where you staying?
@DanHudson73 Green all the way now!
@gavincorbett first big Tam now the Trump wow! The connections you have. Next stop… Burns Supper and you can sing for it ;-)
This is another reason we need more Green cllrs in Edinburgh #May2017 #VoteGreen https://t.co/WUQQE6MDFs
Want a greener Edinburgh? - help re-elect @melaniemain https://t.co/Po1UhiCiks
What a morning to start campaigning for the up coming Edinburgh Council Elections in May #activegreens… https://t.co/kmarAztoAa
@NTCleanStreets @edinhelp You would hope the Council would fine them. Same issues on public space private no permission for adverts. :-(
@UGBarnetyiu have the best Twitter ;-)
@allerdalegreens Thanks!
@allerdalegreens Hi can you supply a working email address the one on your website bounced back
This is an important time to register your views on the future of Crown Estates in Scotland. https://t.co/2tEOGwRpP2
Let's just out this out there: less cars in Edinburgh = less polution. It's simple to make our city better for the people who live in it
@GabbyLogan Edinburgh! Have a good one even tho its a bit wet at the mo!
Amazing - much like the traffic debate today! https://t.co/116uWojuLR
@estherbeadle funny but true 👍🏻
@wavenode @nigelbagshaw Ha ha funny! I hope many Tinder users also use road crossings! ;-)
Huge drop in cars using Edinburgh city centre - Edinburgh Evening News - Looks like 20 mph is having an impact :-) https://t.co/p25jPkvxFu
@danheaped @inchmama agree - we should be collecting for re-distribution and saving them from landfill.
@Edinburgh_CC @SpokesLothian Surely this should of been done at the same time as the Station redesign no? Even if they had to wait for the £
@fountainbridge horrible this time if year if you need to shop ;-)
We'll ten mins before #rogueone starts and I'm the only one in! https://t.co/yEExYjUxvs
This: https://t.co/aOlBa2NcoT
The year ahead… https://t.co/ut7fuXHUZL
In 2017 we have local elections - lets make Edinburgh Greener than its ever been - a better city to live in! Who's in? @EdinburghGreens
@TessaJeanMiller you'd look amazing in either - whatever you want ;-)
@EdinburghTrams Great advice in this rain, currently and storm due Friday/Saturday!
@chrisfl @fountainbridge Think from Memory it was commissioned for another park as part of a development and didn’t happen and end up there
@chrisfl fence is horrible I tried to get removed but council claim it's for safety wondering if moving it out a playground an option?
@fountainbridge it's to stop kids playing on it as it's a sculpture not climbing frame have chatted to local cllrs to see what cold be done
@fountainbridge @scottishcanals Walked past today Shoddy work & in the park the ‘tree sculpture’ or 'climbing frame' locked/fenced off too!
@BBCPhilipSim Hmmm OK. A fix then. Again. Thanks for replying!
@BBCPhilipSim But which one is it?
@s4cedinburgh @RainChameleon @LAHinds @adamrmcvey All day long on Forthone its been shop owners fears & no one asked for the cyclist side
Free wifi but don’t worry about the security :-( Can @Edinburgh_CC ask the supplier to sort out its certificates pl… https://t.co/Cjeph29wii
@shieldsgazette @estherbeadle What is that? no cups or glasses… and are they banding beards too?
@portobellocc Oh how awful they look. :-(
@rosselsewhere nice job I hope it gets somewhere for you!
@dickstrawbridge Yep a lift… I couldn’t stop laughing… but then…. Maybe…. Ouch!
Cold, but lovely golden tones of light early this morning for some Meadows and Causewayside photographs. Now for a warm up!
@_PenguinFlight @Edinburgh_CC Yeah as is so often the case. Hope you get some sleep!
@_PenguinFlight @Edinburgh_CC I hope one or more of the political parties would have something in their manifestos about this for next May!
@_PenguinFlight Is it an Airbnb or a party flat? U can report to the @Edinburgh_CC same issues in @TollcrossCC over these short term lets.
@_PenguinFlight Oh dear such a shame - sorry for ya! ;-(
@_PenguinFlight call 101 or even 999
@PidginPosting doing something right then!
@SRDorman @PidginPosting Need to get this back frm sub group & into the T&E com again for vote. I fear this might b after next Mays Election
@SRDorman @PidginPosting Yes please be careful :-)
@SRDorman @PidginPosting Thought as much. I see the shop owners r consulting I got it sent as Chair TX CC. https://t.co/6qqL4fusUC

@chrisfl yep got the stand alone v6 :-)
@chrisfl Have to say Lightroom is the dogs ;-)
@chrisfl Cheers will take a look.
@chrisfl yes the lens us have! Need to get a copy of lightroom next!

A November Edinburgh https://t.co/VzUrIG2Kiq https://t.co/vqvetfOie5
@chrisfl Got it today clean as a whistle you’d never know it was second hand. Just updated firmware. Sigma seems bloody good too.
@chrisfl Done going to await confirmation of shipping and then order the 35mm Thursday.
@chrisfl Yeah me too... difficult to know. I like the idea of a fixed 35mm see what you think of the camera: https://t.co/LAV0RALhIj
@chrisfl close to getting a second hand MkIII on eBay - what lens would you think - I fancy the Sigma Art 35mm f1.4 but a short zoom maybe?
@PidginPosting Thanks!

To quote .@melaniemain "Greens believe in housing justice: homes should be affordable, easy to keep warm & in well-planned areas” :-)
If Górecki's work was too down beat for you try this. The wonder and playfulness of life... https://t.co/58Cs2SAsJW

Prof. Eugeniusz Knapik said "Górecki's work is like a huge boulder that lies in our path & forces us to make a spiritual & emotional effort"
